title: Electric Vehicles (number)
description: Number of registered plug in electric vehicles (pure and hybrid)

title: Heat Pumps Domestic (number)
description: Number of heat pumps per residential household and commercial properties including hybrids

title: Heat Pumps Non-Domestic (number)
description: Number of heat pumps per residential household and commercial properties including hybrids

title: Total photovoltaic installed capacity (MW)
description: Total Installed PV capacity including both domestic and industrial/commercial

title: Wind generation installed capacity (MW)
description: Installed capacity of industrial and commercial onshore and offshore wind farms

title: Photovoltaic estimated energy produced (MWh)
description: Estimated energy produced by PV units, both residential and commercial/industrial/commercial

title: Wind estimated energy produced (MWh)
description: Estimated energy produced by wind units

title: Energy storage installed capacity (MW)
description: Installed capacity of domestic, industrial and commercial batteries

title: Domestic underlying energy consumption (MWh)
description: Annual energy consumption by residential households excluding electric vehicle and heat pump consumption

title: Industrial and commercial underlying energy consumption (MWh)
description: Annual energy consumption by industrial and commercial properties excluding electric vehicles and heat pump consumption

title: Total energy consumption including electric vehicles and heat pumps (MWh)
description: Total energy consumption by domestic households and industrial and commercial properties including electric vehicle and heat pump consumption

title: Carbon emission avoided by the use of LCTs and renewable generation (tCO2e)
description: Total energy consumption by domestic households and industrial and commercial properties including electric vehicle and heat pump consumption
